title: Mince and broccoli quiche
ingredients: ['500g fresh broccoli (or frozen, thawed)', '500g beef mince', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (23cm) unbaked shortcrust pastry case', '3 eggs', '500ml single cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 handful grated Gruyère, Comté or Emmental cheese']
